Name: ensure_team_has_scrum_master
Description: Each team must have a Scrum Master

Name: worker_must_be_available
Description: Only available workers can be assigned

Name: feature_must_have_priority
Description: Features without priority cannot be scheduled

Name: user_story_requires_acceptance_criteria
Description: User stories must have acceptance criteria

Name: sprint_must_have_goal
Description: Each sprint must define a sprint goal

Name: tasks_must_be_tracked_on_board
Description: All tasks must appear on Scrum Board

Name: epic_cannot_exceed_estimated_effort
Description: Epic effort must not exceed threshold

Name: blocker_must_be_resolved_quickly
Description: Unresolved blockers after 7 days violate condition

Name: velocity_based_on_recent_sprints
Description: Velocity must use at least 3 sprints

Name: release_plan_must_include_features
Description: Each release must include at least one feature

Name: product_owner_must_manage_backlog
Description: Each backlog must have an assigned Product Owner

Name: worker_cannot_exceed_capacity
Description: Total assigned effort must not exceed worker capacity
